headline: Update - Invesco Canada announces amended cash distribution record date for its US dollar denominated ETF units
summary: Invesco Canada Ltd. ("Invesco") announced today that the November 2024 distributions for the US dollar-denominated units of Invesco US Treasury Floating Rate Note Index ETF (USD) (IUFR.U) and Invesco S&P 500 Low Volatility Index ETF (ULV.U) will have an amended record date due to the U.S. Thanksgiving Holiday. Unitholders of record on November 29, 2024, will receive cash distributions payable on December 6, 2024.
